title: Hi, I'm Ólafur! A full stack developer and game enthusiast
description: I build web platforms, mobile apps, and games, blending technical depth with creative problem solving. With experience in startups, retail tech, and indie projects, I’m motivated by learning new technologies and turning ideas into finished products.
description2: Welcome to my portfolio! I’ve gathered some of my most recent and meaningful work here, highlighting the range of technologies I use and the kind of problems I enjoy solving.
